name: Ensure that Activity Log Alert exists for Delete SQL Server Firewall Rule
query:
{
  AzureLogging21To29(equals: "microsoft.sql/servers/firewallrules/delete") {
    identifier
    accountID
    cloudAccountID
    cloudAccountName
    cloudProvider
    idFromProvider
    internalAssetType
    internalName
    internalRegion
    assetCategory
    contentHash
  }
}
